docs.lead_paragraph: A report commissioned by the Columbus business community adds the Blue Jackets to the list of N.H.L. teams on the financial brink, The Columbus Dispatch reports on Thursday.

headline.main: 11/5/09: Blue Jackets in Jeopardy, Chamber of Commerce Report Says

docs.abstract: The Blue Jackets make a push for public financing to offset the $12 million a year the lose at the privately owned arena they're renting. Plus: now the Leafs are in an H1N1 vaccination flap.
docs.snippet: The Blue Jackets make a push for public financing to offset the $12 million a year the lose at the privately owned arena they're renting. Plus: now the Leafs are in an H1N1 vaccination flap.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama made a surprise appearance at the daily White House press briefing on Thursday afternoon to announce that the nation's leading advocacy group for the elderly as well as the largest doctor's organization have endorsed the current health care plan being considered in Congress.

headline.main: Obama Announces Endorsements for Health Care Bill

docs.abstract: President Obama made a surprise appearance at the daily White House press briefing to announce support from the AARP and the American Medical Association.
docs.snippet: President Obama made a surprise appearance at the daily White House press briefing to announce support from the AARP and the American Medical Association.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a last-minute exercise of presidential hand-holding, President Obama plans to travel to Capitol Hill on Friday morning to meet with House Democrats, one day before they vote on his highest domestic priority: a bill to overhaul the nation's health care system.

headline.main: Obama Courts House Democrats Before Vote

docs.abstract: President Obama plans a round of Democratic hand-holding before the House votes on the health care bill.
docs.snippet: President Obama plans a round of Democratic hand-holding before the House votes on the health care bill.

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of opponents of the Democrats' health care legislation are gathered outside the Capitol, for a noon news conference and rally led by Representative Michele Bachmann, Republican of Minnesota, and the chants are already underway, echoing across the Mall.

headline.main: Protesters of Health Care Reform Chant 'Kill the Bill'

docs.abstract: Thousands of demonstrators swarmed Capitol Hill in opposition to the Democrats' health care legislation as debate gets under way in the House.
docs.snippet: Thousands of demonstrators swarmed Capitol Hill in opposition to the Democrats' health care legislation as debate gets under way in the House.
